subject: ? access current test method name, in setUp() and tearDown()
msgSnippet: Hi, I wonder if there is a way to obtain the name of the current test method, when you are in setUp() or tearDown()? Usage : public void tearDown() {
messageBody:
Hi,

I wonder if there is a way to obtain the name of the current test method,
when you are in setUp() or tearDown()?


Usage :


public void tearDown()
{
System.out.println ("You have just executed : " +
<method_name_comes_here> ) ;
printSomeInfoHere () ;
}


Alain Ravet
Brussels, Belgium
